channel.title: Data & Software on MEDIATION Catalog
channel.description: Recent content in Data & Software on MEDIATION Catalog

item.title: Codes & software
item.description: According to F.A.I.R. data principles, codes and pieces of software that have been proven useful in the MEDIATION context will be made publicly available in our github organization.

item.title: Datasets
item.description: The mediation data are stored either on long-lasting servers (ideally), or on several high-performance computing clusters (mainly). They can be retrieved from our github organization.
